EngageManifest.Title: Element Rotator
EngageManifest.Description:
Displays the slide at 950px wide.

This template features Title, Description (content), and Link to the left, and Image to the right. The image total width area is set to 440px. There is also simple numbered pagers located in the lower right. These have background colors set with css to macth Element: Water, but the hex codes can be easily switched out located in Style.css.

This template is designed especially for Engage:Element, but can be used with any skin. to change the dimensions of the template, simply open up the style.css and alter away!

For best results, set the Slide Height in the Content tab of Rotator Settings to the height of your tallest slide.
